goal.ch:
（一）藉由跆拳道訓練獲得更強壯、健美的身體。
（二）藉由武術鍛練，獲得防身能力。
（三）培養武德修養。
凡未曾選修跆拳道課程之本校二、三、四年級及研究所學生均可選修。
（一）跆拳道歷史及發展概況。    （四）太極1～4場。
（二）跆拳道禮儀、規矩。　　    （五）簡易防身技能。
（三）跆拳道基本動作。          （六）競賽規則、約束對練。
goal.en:
(1) Get a stronger and more toned body through Taekwondo training.
(2) Gain self-defense capabilities through martial arts training.
(3) Cultivate martial ethics.
All second-, third-, fourth-year and postgraduate students in our school who have not taken Taekwondo courses can take this course.
(1) Overview of the history and development of Taekwondo. (4) Tai Chi 1 to 4 sessions.
(2) Taekwondo etiquette and rules. (5) Simple self-defense skills.
(3) Basic movements of Taekwondo. (6) Competition rules and restrictions on sparring.
